body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit        Oxon Hill Farm, located inside the Capital Beltway, is a wonderful place to take a break from stresses of urban life! NPS photo      Welcome to Oxon Cove Park and Oxon Hill Farm!“It will not be doubted that with reference either to individual or national welfare, agriculture is of primary importance.” – President George WashingtonOxon Cove Park provides an escape from the bustling city.  Visitors can enjoy a wide variety of activities.  Whether you’re interested in farm animals and gardens, nature and wildlife, history and culture, or exercise like jogging, hiking, and biking, you’ll find something to love at Oxon Cove Park.Our Things To Do  page will get you started on what we have to offer.  Check out our Calendar  to learn more about our daily programs and special events.  View our “Self-Guided Walking Tour ” brochure to better understand the layout of the farm.  Learn about the history of the property and the people that lived here at our History & Culture  page.  View our Hiker-Biker and Woodlot  trail map.  Like us on Facebook  to keep up with what’s going on at the park. Most importantly, come visit us!  We’re open seven days a week from 8:00 am to 4:30 pm.  Hope to see you soon!
title: Oxon Cove  Park & Oxon Hill Farm: Plan Your Visit
